divs: Sighting DetailsWhile I came from Manhattan on the bus (NJ Transit bus - 163), I saw a magnificent view of cloud in the sky. I wanted to catch that moment of the sight;hence, Iused my ipod touch to take a photo of it. Of course, the bus was moving. After I took several times, I checked the photos. On two photos, I noticed something that is flashed on my picutres. I was surprised that I took such picutures. The UFO-like object descend little bit as compare the first photo with the second photo.
Summary: I took a picture of cloud, but I saw a light on the photo I took
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in East Rutherford
There were no other sightings in East Rutherford on or around August 16th 2011
This sighting has never been favorited.
